# isMovable

**Instance Property**

A Boolean that indicates whether the user can move the receiver in its ruler view.

## Declaration

```swift
var isMovable: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] to allow the user to drag the marker image in the ruler, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] to make it immobile.

By default, ruler markers are movable.

## Setting movability

- **isRemovable**: A Boolean that indicates whether the user can remove the receiver from its ruler view.
